statements: SELECT document_id, document_name, document_content FROM documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_name = 'Example Document';
SELECT document_name, last_modified_at FROM documents ORDER BY last_modified_at DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, created_at FROM documents WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT document_id, document_content FROM documents ORDER BY document_id ASC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, created_at FROM documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT document_id, document_name, last_modified_at FROM documents ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_content FROM documents WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_id, document_name, created_at, last_modified_at FROM documents WHERE last_modified_at IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_id = 1;
SELECT content, sender_id, receiver_id FROM notifications WHERE receiver_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE receiver_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT notification_id, content, sender_id, receiver_id FROM notifications WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY notification_id ASC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, created_at FROM notifications WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM notifications JOIN users ON notifications.sender_id = users.user_id WHERE users.role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, message FROM notifications WHERE id > 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT title, content FROM documents WHERE owner_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM notifications JOIN users ON notifications.user_id = users.id WHERE users.role = 'admin';
SELECT id, message, user_id FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE owner_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT DISTINCT owner_id FROM documents WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, title, content FROM documents WHERE title LIKE '%important%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT doc_id, document_name, owner_id, created_at FROM Documents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT notification_id, message, created_at FROM Notifications WHERE recipient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, document_id, can_edit FROM UserPermissions WHERE can_edit = true ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Documents;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT Notifications.notification_id, Users.username, Notifications.message FROM Notifications JOIN Users ON Notifications.recipient_id = Users.user_id;
SELECT Users.username, Documents.document_name FROM Users JOIN Documents ON Users.user_id = Documents.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT doc_name, created_at FROM documents WHERE owner_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT user_id, enable_push_notification FROM notifications_settings WHERE enable_push_notification = 1;
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_notifications > 5;
SELECT doc_name, owner_id, users.username FROM documents JOIN users ON documents.owner_id = users.user_id;
SELECT doc_name, access_level FROM documents JOIN document_users ON documents.doc_id = document_users.doc_id WHERE user_id = 2001;
